ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 465
ygData.msgSnippet: Evulia, Song #8, Keliens Lubrous Lament (sp) is a WONDERFUL addition to your bardsong list. If you want to wow your friends, try this: 1. Find 2-5 mobs that
ygData.messageBody:
Evulia,

Song #8, Keliens Lubrous Lament (sp) is a WONDERFUL addition to your
bardsong list. If you want to wow your friends, try this:

1. Find 2-5 mobs that you want to fight, but don't want to fight all at
once. (ie. if you attack one, they all come running)

2. 'Lament' (Make em sad) the ones you DON'T want to fight.

3. Attack one of the ones you DO want to fight, pull it back a ways (to
get out of the aggro range of his buddies)

4. Repeat with the next mob =)

Enjoy =)

Frashii, Bard of the 26th Chime
Seekers of Lore Officer, Tarew Marr http://www.loreseekers.com

_______
>Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 10:14:30 -0400
>From: "Webber, Jessica" <WebberJ@...>
>Subject: Newbie questions
>
>I'm a flat broke minstrel of the 8th verse bound to Qeynos and I'm
>wondering if it's worth my while to try to earn enough PP and make trek
>back to Kelethin to purchase Kelin's Lament. I can't recall any of you
>more experienced folks posting anything about how Lament has saved your
>life more times than you can remember or wow'd your friends. Should I
>just start saving up for Elemental Rhythms?
>
>Also, what's the next step up from rusty/splintered weapons and is there
>anyplace a bard my age can go to where she may loot them?
>
>Peace
>Evulia of Tunare
